title: Internet Explorer 10
summary: Internet Explorer 10 (IE10) is the tenth version of the Internet Explorer web browser, released by Microsoft on September 4, 2012 along with Windows Server 2012. IE10 was included with the release of Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 on October 26, 2012 and was released for Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2 on November 13, 2012.
